website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a simple knife set that takes up minimal space on your counter, this sleek set is a reliable option.
pros: 5-piece stainless steel set with a sleek block available in several finishes
Knives are lightweight, which some customers find more comfortable
cons: Block does not hold the knives snugly
Some customers received knives with scratched blades

customer_reviews.title: Sharpest set of knives I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these with the hope that they may be better than old knife set I have currently. I admit that I greatly underestimated their power. Within 3 minutes I had not only chopped what would have taken me equally tens of minutes previously, but I had also lost the top of my thumb; I didn't feel a thing. 5/5 - I shall be more careful in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Cox

customer_reviews.title: Reviewed after used.
customer_reviews.text: I work in a professional kitchen. But can't afford expensive knives for my home. I went on a limb and bought these. The are lightweight sturdy and really sharp. For home used they are perfect. Good value for money. If you know how to maintain knives they can last a really long time.
customer_reviews.author: nyagam

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed to say the least
customer_reviews.text: Despite being advertised as stainless steel, they are showing spots of rust !! Disappointed to say the least. The say: "you get what you pay for " doesn't even apply to the product.
customer_reviews.author: behar  deda

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful knife set, everyone’s complimented it. It’s a grey steel sort of colour I’ve had it 19 months now and it’s working well, bread knife is perfect and the two little one that come with it. The big knife which I utilise the most has now lost the sharpness a little bit nothing a knife shatter can’t fix - only issue is the sharpner has left scratches on the knife - not a big deal Was a little disappointed that the end of the knife has chipped a little
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Ascended from carrot cutting being a work out
customer_reviews.text: I wouldnt know about durability yet as it has been a week however I was looking for a cheap enough upgrade to my far too old knife set I am a 1 or 2 knives for everything guy and i cook a lot so I was looking for decent smaller knife set for a good price and my rice cooker and blender are red so.. great The holder is hallow so they rattle a bit But ive gone from hacking sweet potatoes to almost taking off the tip of my finger while cutting beef. Fair enough. Worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Taeil

customer_reviews.title: So sharp and red
customer_reviews.text: These knife are so good and very sharp so sharp I cut the end of my finger off on my first use of them but not to worry it grew back and I'm alot careful now, im such a silly goose. I recommend this product but not cutting the end of your finger off.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Nye

customer_reviews.title: 00 and is good value IMHO
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised to find that the knife block is actually metal. Mine had a slight scratch though, which was disappointing. The knives also don't fit particularly snugly as the block is completely hollow. The knives are also rather light and not well weighted. In fairness to the minus points, the set is only £30.00 and is good value IMHO. I've only just received delivery so I can't comment on the long term quality of the blades...
customer_reviews.author: MR J P CAMERON

customer_reviews.title: Good knives which keep a good edge
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had these for long, but they seem well made and look very smart. They are very comfortable in the hand and are well weighted. Their longevity will only be proven over time, but so far I would recommend them. Good knives at the reasonable price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Andy T

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. After reading all reviews decided to go for this. Cheapest around when I brought this. Colour wise, not pure black. Has got a purple hue in certain light. I put this in a dark corner so not borther me :) Product itself I found very good. Light and cut well. Very sharp. One of the knifes has gone rusty but that was due to laziness. Used the knife, washed it, but not dried it. Others I always wash and dry, none of them went rusty. Over all good product if you look after it. Colour does not really borther me but some people may want pure black.
customer_reviews.author: Rickshaw Dave

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp great value knifes
customer_reviews.text: Just had these delivered and comparing to my old set of knifes I'm pretty impressed. Look great and so far very easy to clean. First tried cutting some cheese with the small knife and damn these are sharp. I would say great value for what you get and nice stand as well.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: When I first got these I was excited!
customer_reviews.text: It’s the first time buying knives as I recently moved out of my family house to go to university and decided to buy these! Now usually I don’t get excited when it comes to Home and Kitchen stuff but when this came I was so excited to use! The blade is so smooth and sharp that it was easy to cut through veggies, meat and bread. Giving you the choice of four/five knives (can’t really remember and I’m in bed hahah) it helps and with the price you can’t beat a good set of knives and aesthetically pleasing as well. A very good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Therese Ulangkaya

customer_reviews.title: these are good knives but please note THEY ARE INCREDBILY LIGHT
customer_reviews.text: these are good knives but please note THEY ARE INCREDBILY LIGHT. so if you want heavy weighted knives these are not for you at all!
customer_reviews.author: E Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Really good knives
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and so sharp. Seriously I'm considering chopping my partner's head off cos I reckon they would cut through bones like a hot knife in butter. I'm extremely happy with these. The balance on the knives are really good. They are comfortable to grip and they clean really well. No streaks in my dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy randell

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant set of knives!
customer_reviews.text: We didn't expect anything fancy from this set of knives, by any means - we just ordered a cheap set to keep out the caravan! ...but both of us are pleasantly surprised by the quality of these knives! They're comfortable to hold and really sharp - they glide through [whatever it is you're cutting] with ease! Ok, I admit these aren't professional chef standard, by any means, but you'd have to pay AT LEAST triple the price of this whole set just to get 1 chef quality knife!! So for the price, I think these are fab and would recommend to anybody looking for a good set of knives on a budget. We're happy :-)
customer_reviews.author: T.Coombe

customer_reviews.title: badly designed and thought out
customer_reviews.text: the base has no weight to it ,the rubber pieces arould the knives are flimsy and loose, the knives themselves seemed ok but i havent washed/used them as Im returning for a refund because the knives ar not held securely in the block as the whole thing is hollow the knives jiggle into each other
customer_reviews.author: margesimpson

customer_reviews.title: Feel cheaper than I'd hoped
customer_reviews.text: Overall these knives are perfectly adequate, and do the job they're made for - very sharp, and seem like they will last a fair while. Aesthetically they're great. However, the knives and the holder all feel cheaper than I am comfortable with, and I am not someone who's snobby about these things. The knives are very lightweight, and they rattle around in the holder as it's hollow. They'll be fine if you're expecting cheap and cheerful, but I don't think I'll be keeping them long.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Scratched to high heavens
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended from my experience, I ordered this very good looking knife set and when it arrives it looks as good as expected however the first one I ordered had a big scratch on the top of it with several scratches over the front. I ordered a replacement and when I opened that it looked like it was second hand, clearly not new. it had 2 big dints in the front and scratched to high heavens. It would be nice if the base for the knives was protected with a film or something to prevent scratching and some better packing to prevent dints.
customer_reviews.author: Josh C.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Gotta say though those were too expensive but I admit is totally worth it. Best knifes I’ve bought in years. Had them for about 6 months and they’re still as sharp as the day I bought them. The problem I had with the knifes before is that they would become dull after a while or would break by the handle, these don’t have that problem. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Silva

customer_reviews.title: Blunt
customer_reviews.text: To be blunt these knifes are blunt, they are very light and not sharp one bit. They look nice just a shame i'm going to have to buy a knife sharpener now. I don't recommend you buy them unless you are really skint and this is all you can find, but buy a knife sharpener tool otherwise you will be gutted. A kitchen towel is sharper :)
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Look good, but poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: The knives looks quite good, but the quality is very poor. The instructions advise they can be cleaned in the dishwasher, but over time may tarnish. They went in the dishwasher on day one after use, and one of the knives already has 2 rust spots. Cant be bothered to return them. (In fact mine were returns) you can see that the box had been retaped up and the knives wrapping were ripped in places. Anyway will hand wash them from.now on and hope for the best.
customer_reviews.author: DogRose

customer_reviews.title: Sharp. Very sharp. Extremely sharp. Please take care
customer_reviews.text: As others have said these are extremely sharp. I’d read this on the reviews so was careful the first time I used them but still managed to cut myself! They’re a little longer than my previous knife set which is neither a good thing or bad thing to me but I think it was this difference that lead me to get cut to begin with. They look very smart sitting on my black granite worktop and are a nice heavy weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great set of knives great value
customer_reviews.text: These knives are beautifully made and are easy to sharpen the metal block they come in in is perfect for the job job. It's a personal preference that the the handle is smooth stainless steel and and may not be a perfect grip at all times. I have now been using the blades for about 6 weeks and have got used to the smooth handle they are fantastic knives and would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: These are very good sharp knives and they present themselves very well with the included holder. I have used all of them with no problems at all they are good to hold and certainly stay very sharp. People have mentioned the rust; yes they do just a little bit but I suppose that that's expected at such a cheap price point. We must remember that knives that probably don't rust would cost anything from £500 to £1000. So my review is in respect of this.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P. W. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good value - great set of basic knives.
customer_reviews.text: Great set of knives, really sharp and light. I read the reviews before ordering so knew they sit loosely in the hollow base but that’s not a problem. Very good price and well worth it. I do a lot of veg chopping for soups so they’re a great help. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Titch

customer_reviews.title: Morphy Richards Red Knife Block
customer_reviews.text: Had 2 get a replacement as 1sr knife bloxk arrived with a big dent in it and some red paint was scratched off but Amazon replaced it very quickly.I think the danage happened in transit as the 2nd one was perfect.A very attractive kbife block in your kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Ld Lovell

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: This set is fantastic value for money. I can't say I'm ever likely to use the bread knife but you don't seem to be able to buy a knife set without one. I mostly use the two smallest knives and I'm finding them fine for most tasks. It's a set that looks great as is performing well so far. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Pigkate

customer_reviews.title: Great knives
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are nice and sharp. Really good design, look good and do the job they’re meant too. Having had several poor sets of knives I’m very happy with these. I hand wash them as other reviews said dishwasher caused staining so I don’t want to risk it.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Block Poor
customer_reviews.text: As others have noted the block for these knives let them down, it is hollow and too light. Item returned.
customer_reviews.author: Phaid

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a more expensive Tower knife block set, but the knife handles broke after only 6 months and they were not sharp. It was also hard to clean. This was a fraction of the price and does a much better job. Looks good in the kitchen and just need to wipe with a cloth. Knives excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Lovely selection of sharp knives
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set of sharp knives....they look great....only slight thing is the holder is not as solid as I thought...but very happy overall...and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paula-Jane Lea

customer_reviews.title: Decent kitchen knives.
customer_reviews.text: By no means are these the best but for the price you can’t really go wrong, they’re comfortable to use, you get a good selection of basic knives for kitchen use. I would suggest keeping a sharpener / chefs steel for occasionally touching up, as they do lose their edge somewhat.
customer_reviews.author: M A

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again. Can recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Knives are excellent for chopping with. They are nice and sharp. Very easy to keep clean. However, I find that the largest knife does not sit all that great in the hand and feels mildly uncomfortable to use for tough objects (like butternut squash). Good value for money. Would I buy them again? Absolutely. I could not live without such nice sharp knives. Even the bread knife is miles better than my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: The blade quality is satisfactory / content for the price but the paint quality on the handles is very poor. The paint was flaking off the handles within a few dishwasher runs. Whether or not just hand washing would have made a difference; who knows.
customer_reviews.author: SFR

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but would not buy again, the block is bad.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the reviews said the holding block is solid metal. It isn’t... It looks nice, but feels cheap and every time you get a knife or put it in it makes horrible cheap sound. It feels like the knifes are trying to cut into the block. The knifes are fine for the money, so I will probably throw the block away and hold them somewhere else. I regret buying them cause I was misinformed and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Oliviu

customer_reviews.title: Nice knife block
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knife block for my parents for Christmas, and I have to say these knifes are really good. They're super sharp, easy to hold, and easy to clean, the knife block looks very presentable in the kitchen. So, I'm pleased with this knife block I bought them, they are also pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Leatherland

customer_reviews.title: Seem like good but holder is not black as in pictures
customer_reviews.text: The knives are lightweight then my usual set. Not sure if that is a good thing or bad? However the colour of the holder is not black as seen on pictures as it seems more dark grey as others also mentioned in reviews, just be ware when purchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: Sayed

customer_reviews.title: Darker colour than the other Morphy Richard products in this range
customer_reviews.text: I have bought all the copper kitchen set from Morphy Richards, but this knife stand is a good few tones darker than the rest, so looks a little weird.... Apart from that, it's a great set, and good quality knives.
customer_reviews.author: Denby

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I left one of the knives on the draining board against a damp cloth when I went away for a weekend. On my return the side of the knife that was against the cloth was rusty.
customer_reviews.author: james wild

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: The holder is pretty and a bit lighter than expected the knives fit loosely. However I think this may be more hygienic. SHARP SHARP SHARP. Be careful when handling I shaved the back of my fingernail without realising.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: We have been using these for a good few months now, they look great in the kitchen and are still just as sharp as when i brought them, these are the only knives i need now, packaged very well and arrived in good time highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving 4stars because I just got them, so haven't been able to use them a lot. But my boyfriend used one of them to cut bread and I used them to cut an oragen and they are really good. And having the knife holder thing is really pratical at least keep them tidy and it's easy to find and grab the knife you need :)
customer_reviews.author: David Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Ok value for money
customer_reviews.text: I like the colour but not happy with the rattling sound it makes when you insert the knives back in the block, could have done with something inside to stop it from rattling inside against the block. However, I did like the soft feeling of the knives, Ray to clean but warning, make sure it’s dry before putting them away as they stain with rust immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Marchant💕💕

customer_reviews.title: Buy it new
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, I can't remember if mine were second hand or not, but they came sello-taped to some cardboard for safe transport, which would have been fine if there wasn't sticky tape residue left behind on the blades. Other than that, it's much lighter than it looks (hollow) and it looks fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Smart

customer_reviews.title: Good buy and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money and have used them every day since they were delivered. Very strong and sharp do watch your fingers. Not as heavy as you would imagine given they are stainless steel. The handles are shaped and easy to hold even with wet or greasy hands. I have only had them a week, so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Geoff H

customer_reviews.title: Great piece for kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Knives are really sharp, very comfortable to use. It looks really nice in a kitchen. The design of stand is nice. All types of knives in one set - this is all what is needed in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Birute

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value for money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a knives block for a long time but they were either too expensive or did not suit the modern look of my kitchen. This set of knives has really been such a great purchase. I’ve had it for over 1 month and I can’t find fault with it. It’s stylish, value for money, the knives are great quality and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Long Terms use Great
customer_reviews.text: i have used these knives for a few years now as my main kitchen knives. They are great hold an edge really well and are easy to sharpen. it is definitely worth paying for knives and would recommend these to anyone and they are still going strong and expect them to last year to come
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Belchamber

customer_reviews.title: Lovely looking knife block
customer_reviews.text: The Knives are sleek and sharp. Upon opening the product One knife it the set had a slight warp on the cutting edge - but it’s one I use the least, so I can live with that. I Use these knives every day and no issues with them.
customer_reviews.author: T C

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand
customer_reviews.text: Very great brand and quality although Amazon sent me a box that had been probably returned by another customer. The package was resealed. Knives were in perfect brand new condition tho.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Look nice, cut well
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking knife set for the kitchen Really classy and fits in well in a modern kitchen. Good sharp knives all cut really well, and clean well on the dishwasher without rusting
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to match our kitchen after I ma ages to snap an old knife by slicing into a block of cheese... Lovely chrome shine to the holder and th variety of knifes it comes with is really versitile. Uber sharp though and my poor finger found out :)
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: **WARNING** VERY SHARP!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely FANTASTIC knives set! But deary me BE CAREFUL!!!!! There have been a few cuts among the family and they have barely even touched the blade! Handle with extreme care but seriously BUY THE KNIVES!!! lol
customer_reviews.author: Mande Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of knives.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present, for my sister who's set of knives were past their best, and then some. She really liked them, and when I tried them boxing day they are good. If I needed a set of knives I would buy them for myself.
customer_reviews.author: M. D. Saunderson

customer_reviews.title: Knifes good, stand not balanced well.
customer_reviews.text: Knifes are nice ad sharp, but the base feels rather unstable and too light to hold those sharp objects safely in place. Be aware if you have small children running around kitchen. Would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: this set looks great, knives are very very sharp (dont chuck them in washing up bowl coz you will cut yourself if you grab wrong end in the water) i wash mine separately, dry and put back as soon as i used them,good valur for money and i would deffo recommend
customer_reviews.author: pipster1

customer_reviews.title: Knife set
customer_reviews.text: Got for my new home, to be. Havent used yet. But recommend. The colour is absolutely lovely. And the knifes & stand look to notch. Really looking forward to using, in my new place.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Jane Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Knives
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good set of Knives, I got them for my Husband as one of his Christmas present. Very sharp, nice to hold and use and they look good in the knife holder.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. A. J. Taylor Pinnick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Love the qility look so good in my kitchen would have liked the handle to be wooden because of weakness... but yes I love them and would recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Vie

customer_reviews.title: Look really good on side and nice weight
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Light so easy to hold for me. Very sharp and look good in my kitchen with all my other red, black and chrome equipment. Also good price.
customer_reviews.author: TinaEltham

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely not recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: A really flimsy knife block and set of knives...no weight or sense of it being a robust knife block. As soon as i opened the package and felt and saw the product i repackaged it and sent is straight back. Would definitely not recommend it...
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Suprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: So i read the reviews and was unsure if to buy or not. Glad i did they are very sharp they look great in my kitchen and have yet to rust like the reveiws say they do. Overall very happy with them thank you
customer_reviews.author: Michael Paul Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted more than a budget knife block and this one is fantastic. Knives are sharp and make meal preparation a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: the knives wobble in the holder after a while
customer_reviews.text: good knives and do the job perfectly. The downside is that the knives wobble and are not stable in the holder after a while! I would buy knives again but not that holder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Was perfect colour and size n price for my friends for their anniversary pressies n they were over the moon with the entire look usability n storage of it all
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C. Blanshard

customer_reviews.title: Rusty
customer_reviews.text: Look great to start with but mine after a few washes in the dishwasher have gone rusty. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is my first full set of sharp knifes in years. What a difference they make to preparing food. The storage block makes keeping them safe and accessable on the counter top easy. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: jerrysimon

customer_reviews.title: lovely sharp knives
customer_reviews.text: great item, they match our other cream morphy richards we bought for our new kitchen. they are very lightweight but that doesnt bother us as they do the job. the block itself can sound quite tinny when getting the knives out but all in all, great item
customer_reviews.author: joni88

customer_reviews.title: Functionality good. Quality bad.
customer_reviews.text: Generally the functionality is good. But they need to look at there quality control. Wonky logos, bad welding, font differences. It isn’t what I would expect from a brand like morphy Richards.
customer_reviews.author: Yoshi

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and strong!
customer_reviews.text: Really great knives. Chop through anything. Need to cut a tomato? No problem. A potato? Easy. Got a tree that you want cutting down in your back garden? Probably wont do the job but it would give it a go. Best knives I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: stylish
customer_reviews.text: The holder is very tinny , would be better if it was a solid block but having said that , they are very stylish , nice shaped holder
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent knife set
customer_reviews.text: My husband, the cook :), says that these are really good knives They are also very easy to clean as they are one piece so no food gets in a groove between the blade and handle.
customer_reviews.author: sally

customer_reviews.title: Block is not black, more like black chrome
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had them long but seem good quality and well made. They are sharp and quite light. Only gripe is the knife block which is not black, its more black chrome or a very dark metallic grey.
customer_reviews.author: GRH

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my sister in law. She have a small food business and she said that knives are really good
customer_reviews.author: Lukasz Pozauc

customer_reviews.title: Love the red colour
customer_reviews.text: Nice knife set and look good in red kitchen they are solid and nice and sharp good value
customer_reviews.author: stuart

customer_reviews.title: RUST! Do NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: These are lovely knives, BUT the block is rubbish and the knives are rusty. I can’t use them. What a shame and a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great knives, but....
customer_reviews.text: .... they come blunt, so you will need to properly sharpen them if you want to cut anything more than wet paper!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Sharp.
customer_reviews.text: This is the last time I get her indoors anything sharp for an anniversary gift.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel S.

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT KITCHEN ACCESSORY IF YOU HAVE CHROME OR STEEL GADGETS - LOOKS FAB
customer_reviews.text: I was hugely pleased and impressed with this knife block - I bought it mainly to look good on my new worrktops alongside my other polished steel appliances and accessories and it certainly fitted the bill appearance wise - it cleans well too with an e-cloth and just gleams away - an added bonus for me, having arthritic hands and arms, is that it is impressively light to move around unlike other knife blocks I have had and also when standing feels secure and safe - I haven't used the knives yet but they look sharp and sturdy. a good buy at a reasonable price with a good delivery service and packaging. recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine D.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Great set of knives for a decent price. Very sharp as my brother found out so be careful with them!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Good knives
customer_reviews.text: Nice knife set - the block looks presentable on the side in the kitchen. The knives are sharp and go in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: Lily Radley

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sharp
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp! They work for us perfectly and look nice on the countertop. Not a bad price at all considering the quality. Recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Hough

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for Christmas, good set of knifes look lovely.
customer_reviews.author: L.Benton

customer_reviews.title: Pretty poor
customer_reviews.text: Poor Quality, didnt fit into the holder very well. Sent back.
customer_reviews.author: John Worsley

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and good sharp knives.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly had to return due to carving knife missing and had two bread knives. Great customer service and have my replacement already.
customer_reviews.author: Midnawolf

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Really nice colour. Knives are sturdy. The block is good and its all a nice size
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and sturdy knives
customer_reviews.text: These knives are a great addition to any kitchen. The block is metalic and has a nice finish. The knives are extremely sharp (which is what you're looking for) however beware when using the first few times to not lose a finger. Easy to clean too, would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ami

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Used everyday, lovely set of knives and love the colour of the stand. I get quite a few comments over it. would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Not stainless but really sharp
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty good, but don't let them into the water for a long period of time, because they're not stainless.
customer_reviews.author: Luis C.

customer_reviews.title: Very good knives.
customer_reviews.text: Very good knives and very sharp. Look good in the block but colour dosn't match all the other morphy richards items I bought in copper. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great sleek design, sturdy holder and easy to use and control knives.
customer_reviews.author: emma

customer_reviews.title: Light and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Knifes are so light and flimsy can’t see them lasting very long definitely would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: lorraine benton

customer_reviews.title: Lovely design
customer_reviews.text: Great to look at and use. Not to heavy. Nice knives.
customer_reviews.author: patch

customer_reviews.title: great knives for the money
customer_reviews.text: New so cant rate for longevity but arrived really sharp with no sharpening marks on the blades. really nice to hold, some may find them just a little light. i did but soon adjusted to them
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Was going to buy this for the mother-in-law because she is prone to stabbing me in the back, but instead, my mum is making real good use and says they are extremely sharp and loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Gill

customer_reviews.title: Item wasn't as shown
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the handles were red but when I got it delivered I discovered only the knife block was red and the handles were silver. I contacted the seller and they told me they haven't updated the image. Even so, they didn't mention anywhere in the description that the image was not like the item itself. The knives are great but need sharpening regularly.
customer_reviews.author: katie mcfadyen

customer_reviews.title: The block is hollow
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to feel how light everything was. Maybe I’m just not used to it but the knives are really light and the block that they sit in is really hollow
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Awful quality
customer_reviews.text: Almost £40, had for less than a week and despite washing and drying the knifes instantly after use there are already signs of rusting. Really bad quality. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Arrived rusty! Return requested.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with knife block rusty. I didn’t even open the box containing the knives as I am returning the whole lot. Very disappointed. Quality control zero obviously.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Looks the Part & Works Well
customer_reviews.text: The knife block is smart and compact and the knives work well.
customer_reviews.author: Dazman

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: 2 weeks after xmas and 3 knives are already blunt Very disappointed but I guess you get what you pay for. The knives are very flimsy and lightweight and quite clearly are not hardened and tempered properly #avoid#payalittlemore
customer_reviews.author: Paul broadhead

product_meta.title: Morphy Richards 5 Piece Knife Block-Ivory Cream, 15.3 x 13.3 x 32.8 cm
product_meta.description: Color:Ivory CreamComplete your kitchen with the robust build of this high quality stainless steel five piece knife set. Presented in a sleek cream colour-matched heavy steel block, this set includes a 20 cm bread knife, 20 cm chef knife, a 20 cm slicing knife, a 12.5 cm utility knife and a 7.5 cm paring knife, all featuring ergonomic handles for comfortable control during use. The high-grade, fine-edged stainless steel blades glide through your everyday kitchen cutting tasks, while the elegant satin polished coatings provide a visually appealing feature as you slice. A simple hand wash with gentle cleaning products and a towel dry is recommended to retain the performance and appearance of each knife.
feature_bullets: Five pieces knife set complete with a bread knife, chef knife, slicing knife, utility knife and a paring knife
High-grade fine edged stainless steel blades in a satin polish provide an easy glide
Ergonomic handles provide comfort and control during use
Colour-matched heavy steel knife block, with other Morphy kitchen accessories
Hand wash with gentle cleaning products recommended for sustained use
Comes with 1 year guarantee, extended 5 years warranty available upon registration of product

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars324 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
